Meet the Author

Meet the Author: Heather Morris

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 22, 2019

Heather Morris talks about The Tattooist of Auschwitz and Cilka's Journey, and the messages they convey.

Meet the Author: A. L. Kennedy

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 15, 2019

A. L. Kennedy tells us why she loves writing for children, and what we can expect from her session at Waveney Kids' Book Festival.

Meet the Author: John Higgs

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 8, 2019

John Higgs tells us why he is optimistic about the future, and what we can expect at his Lavenham Literary Festival talk in November.

Meet the Author: Kate Weinberg

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 1, 2019

Kate Weinberg tells us about her debut novel, The Truants, and why she enjoyed working as a ghostwriter before publishing in her own voice.

Meet the Author: Brian Bilston

Written by Brandon King · Published Sep 17, 2019

Poet Brian Bilston tells us about the advantages and disadvantages of sharing his work on social media, and what we can expect from him next.

Meet the Author: Amanda Mason

Written by Brandon King · Published Sep 10, 2019

Amanda Mason tells us about her spooky debut novel The Wayward Girls and her journey to publication.

Meet the Author: Clare Mulley

Written by Brandon King · Published Sep 3, 2019

Clare Mulley describes the challenges and rewards of writing about remarkable women in history and gives us a taster of her talk at Lavenham Literary Festival in November.

Meet the Author: Rebecca Goss

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 27, 2019

Poet Rebecca Goss discusses her influences, inspirations and relaxed writing routine, and tells us what she's planning for her Lavenham Literary Festival talk in November.

Meet the Author: Vaseem Khan

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 20, 2019

Vaseem Khan tells us about the scene that ultimately inspired his Baby Ganesh Agency series, his long path to publication, and his passion for libraries.

Meet the Author: Hugh Montgomery

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 13, 2019

Hugh Montgomery tells us how Lynda La Plante helped him write his debut thriller, Control, talks about his experience on Desert Island Discs, and reveals his grand plans for the future.
